all_text_timv: New College (University of Oxford). Choir performer. Copland and his American contemporaries [sound recording]. [England] : Avie, [2006] ℗2006 1 audio disc : digital, stereo. ; 4 3/4 in. performed music prm rdacontent audio s rdamedia audio disc sd rdacarrier Twentieth-century masters ; v. 3 Unacc. choral music, in part with organ. Compact disc. Program notes in English, French, and German, and texts in English or Latin with English translations inserted in container. The song of Deborah / Adolphus Hailstork (6:01) -- In the beginning / Aaron Copland (17:00) -- I will sing and raise a Psalm / Libby Larsen (4:46) -- O magnum mysterium / Morten Lauridsen (6:09) -- O Deus, ego amo te (3:38) ; Oratio patris condren : O Jesu vivens in Maria (2:01) ; Thee, God ... (2:58) / Ned Rorem -- Psalm 67 / Charles Ives (2:26) -- The dove descending (2:26) ; Mass (17:05) / Igor Stravinsky -- Steal away : from A child of our time / Michael Tippett (3:20). Choir of New College Oxford ; Edward Higginbottom, director ;  Katherine Bond, mezzo-soprano (2nd work). Recorded July 11-15, 2005, New College Chapel, Oxford, England. Sung in English and Latin. Choruses, Sacred (Mixed voices), Unaccompanied. Choruses, Sacred (Mixed voices) with organ. Masses. Music United States 20th century. Music United States 21st century. Higginbottom, Edward, conductor. Bond, Katherine C., performer. Hailstork, Adolphus C. Song of Deborah. Copland, Aaron, 1900-1990. In the beginning. Larsen, Libby. I will sing and raise a psalm. Lauridsen, Morten, 1943- O magnum mysterium. Rorem, Ned, 1923- Choral music. Selections. Ives, Charles, 1874-1954. Psalm 67. Stravinsky, Igor, 1882-1971. Dove descending breaks the air. Stravinsky, Igor, 1882-1971. Mass. Tippett, Michael, 1905-1998. Child of our time. Steal away. Twentieth-century masters (Avie (Sound recording label)) ; v. 3.
